Package com.codewithej.realestateapi.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.codewithej.realestateapi.controller.ClientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/clients") public class ClientController extends Object
Rest controller for managing clients.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on clients, managing their associated agent, and their interested properties.

    • createClient

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientDTO> createClient(@RequestBody ClientDTO clientDTO)
      Creates a new client.
      Parameters:
      clientDTO - The client DTO for creation.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the created client DTO and HTTP status code.

    • updateClient

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientDTO> updateClient(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody ClientDTO clientDTO)
      Updates an existing client.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to update.
      clientDTO - The updated client DTO.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated client DTO.

    • deleteClient

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteClient(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP no content status.

      Retrieves a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the found client DTO.

    • getAllClients

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ClientDTO>> getAllClients()
      Retrieves all clients.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of all client DTOs.

    • findClientsByName

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ClientDTO>> findClientsByName(@RequestParam String name)
      Finds clients by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of clients matching the name.

    • setClientAgent

      @PostMapping("/{clientId}/setAgent/{agentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientDTO> setClientAgent(@PathVariable Long clientId, @PathVariable Long agentId)
      Sets the agent for a client.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      agentId - The ID of the agent to be set for the client.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated client DTO.

    • setInterestedProperties

      @PostMapping("/{clientId}/interested-properties") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<ClientDTO>> setInterestedProperties(@PathVariable Long clientId, @RequestBody Set<Long> propertyIds)
      Sets the properties in which a client is interested.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      propertyIds - The IDs of the properties of interest.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated client DTOs.

    • getInterestedProperties

      @GetMapping("/{clientId}/interested-properties") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<ClientDTO>> getInterestedProperties(@PathVariable Long clientId)
      Retrieves the properties in which a client is interested.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the set of client DTOs interested in specific properties.
